entry.title: Manipuler les prévision météorologiques avec Python
entry.content: Debut 2024, Météo France à ouvert toutes ses données météorologiques au public, incluant les observations et les prévisions.
entry.summary: Debut 2024, Météo France à ouvert toutes ses données météorologiques au public, incluant les observations et les prévisions.

entry.title: Checking package version bump in Gitlab CI/CD
entry.content: Using Gitlab, you can deploy you package to the Gitlab package repository. This is a great way to share your package with your team, privately or publicly.
entry.summary: Using Gitlab, you can deploy you package to the Gitlab package repository. This is a great way to share your package with your team, privately or publicly.

entry.title: Testing Gitlab CI Locally
entry.content: Developing a Gitlab CI pipeline can be a bit cumbersome as you have to push your code to a remote repository to test it. In this article, we will see how to test a Gitlab CI pipeline locally.
entry.summary: Developing a Gitlab CI pipeline can be a bit cumbersome as you have to push your code to a remote repository to test it. In this article, we will see how to test a Gitlab CI pipeline locally.

entry.title: Use Docker Operator in Airflow Docker
entry.content: In this post, we will see how to use the Docker Operator in Airflow with the Docker compose deployment.
entry.summary: In this post, we will see how to use the Docker Operator in Airflow with the Docker compose deployment.

entry.title: New Blog with Sphinx
entry.content: Following the stepts of errbufferoverfl and Chris Holdgraf I’m also changing my blog to use Sphinx.my blog using Hugo to Sphinx. I’m using the ablog extension to create the blog posts.
entry.summary: Following the stepts of errbufferoverfl and Chris Holdgraf I’m also changing my blog to use Sphinx.my blog using Hugo to Sphinx. I’m using the ablog extension to create the blog posts.
